channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After Removing Statue Of American Hero, UVA Plans To Replace It With Massive Land Acknowledgement
item.description: UVA just recently, supposedly, ended its era of capitulation to the thugs in the 'Black Lives Matter' tyranny, and it seems the least the school could...

item.title: Yes, President Trump Can Pardon The 77 People Prosecuted For 2020 Election Integrity Efforts
item.description: Media wrongly insist that the pardon clause only applies to federal charges, yet every attempt to narrow the scope of pardons has failed.

item.title: Trump says DOJ should look into Epstein ties to Democrats

item.description: Plus: Remembering James Watson and his complicated legacy.

item.title: The GOP Can’t Punt on Health Care
item.description: Failing to introduce and explain Obamacare alternatives represents a serious political risk.

item.title: The Spiritual Tariffs on Ballad of a Small Player
item.description: A psychodrama about the West’s diminishing identity.

item.title: Ken Burns’ The American Revolution Kicks Off the Quarter-Millennial Celebrations
item.description: The famed documentarian takes on the American founding, and the result is an inspiring reminder that we have much to be grateful for.

item.title: With Jocelyn Benson Set To Referee Her Own Race For Governor, Michigan GOP Asks DOJ To Monitor Election
item.description: Michigan Sec. of State Jocelyn Benson, a Democrat, will oversee her own election results when she appears on the ballot.

item.title: Congress Didn’t Give Trump an Unlimited License to Tariff
item.description: The best legal argument for the Trump tariffs assumes that we are currently in a declared war with every country on the planet.

item.title: Don’t Bet the House on the 50-Year Mortgage
item.description: President Trump’s proposed reform would be a terrible deal for homebuyers and taxpayers alike.
